item.title: Justin Sun boards Spaceship and Ignites Engines, Space Journey Officially Begins
item.description: On August 3rd, as per Blue Origin's official live stream, the Blue Origin spacecraft New Shepard, which was carrying TRON Founder Justin Sun, ignited and took off at 20:43. The spacecraft has successfully reached space.In 2021, Justin Sun successfully bid $28 million for the "New Shepard" first crewed flight seat. He donated all the bidding funds to Blue Origin's "Club for the Future" in order to support global youth STEM education.

item.title: Whale AguilaTrades' 40x leverage Bitcoin long position is currently at a $12,000 unrealized loss
item.description: On August 3rd, as monitored by Onchain Lens, whale AguilaTrades' newly opened 40x leveraged long position in Bitcoin is currently facing a $12,000 unrealized loss. Previously, it had achieved an unrealized gain of more than $40 million but ultimately "got liquidated to zero," with only $73,000 remaining in the wallet.

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Retests Key Support Level, Institutional Buying Pressure Key Variable
item.description: On August 3rd, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. put forward that due to the non-farm payroll data coming in below expectations (73k versus the expected 110k), the Fed's decision to hold rates for the fifth consecutive time with internal differences, and the escalating trade tensions and other macro headwinds, the global market has shifted to a "risk-off" mode. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq experienced their worst performance since April. U.S. bond yields dropped by nearly 20 basis points, and gold saw an inflow.Bitcoin also came under pressure and quickly retraced from a high of $119,800 to $112,000. The 30-day momentum decreased to +3%, and the ADX slid to 36, indicating a weakening short-term bullish momentum. On-chain activity decreased, but exchange outflows still showed ongoing accumulation in the market.Despite the intensified short-term volatility, the structural bullish thesis remains unchanged. Strategies and institutions added more than 30k BTC to their holdings in the past we

item.title: Musk retweeted X account @a, @v, and other information updates to Grok partner's tweet
item.description: On August 3rd, Musk retweeted a tweet which said, "The accounts on the X Platform with the handle @a have modified their profiles to the xAI-developed Grok humanoid companion Ani. The accounts with the handle @v have changed their profiles to the xAI-developed Grok humanoid companion Valentine. The accounts with the handle @Rudi have updated their profiles to the xAI-developed Grok pet companion Rudi, and so on."

item.title: Ethereum's Second Largest Holder SBET Holds Unrealized Gains of Over $200 Million
item.description: On August 3rd, as SharpLink Gaming (SBET) once more boosted its ETH holdings today, its strategic ETH reserve has grown to 480,204 coins. The weighted average price is approximately $3,045, and it currently shows an unrealized gain of $221 million.According to HTX market data, ETH has surpassed $3,500 and is currently trading at $3,507, with a 24-hour increase of 0.45%.

item.title: 「Insider Trader」 @qwatio Increases Short Position to $300 Million Nominal Value, Currently Profiting $7 Million
item.description: On August 3rd, as per Ember Monitor, the "Insider Trader" @qwatio continued to add to their short position one and a half hours ago, raising the value of the short position to 300 million US dollars. @qwatio is currently shorting four tokens: BTC, ETH, XRP, and SOL, with an unrealized profit of 7 million US dollars.

item.title: Bitcoin Surges to Touch $114,000
item.description: On August 3rd, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin rebounded and touched $114,000. It is currently priced at $114,000 and has a 24-hour gain of 0.34%.

item.title: Trump Media & Technology Group Officially Unveils "Truth" Token-Related Plans
item.description: On August 3rd, according to DL News, the Trump Media and Technology Group (TMTG) officially presented its plans for the Truth brand utility token and digital wallet in the most recent filing submitted to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). As early as several months ago, the company hinted at this concept in a letter to its shareholders.The filing shows that the token will be a part of a "more extensive reward plan" and integrated into the "Truth digital wallet". Its initial uses involve paying for Truth+ subscription fees. As the project advances, the token may also be applicable to other products and services within the Truth ecosystem, suggesting that it may have a broader range of uses across the entire platform in the future.Although the filing does not directly refer to it as "cryptocurrency", the wording implies that it is likely to be built on blockchain infrastructure. This second-quarter earnings report is the first time this project has appeared in public

item.title: Whale Sets 10 Big Goals: Bitcoin Long Position Already Up $1.31M
item.description: On August 3rd, a screenshot disclosed by the whale "Setting 10 Big Goals First" on their personal social media platform indicates that their 5x leveraged Bitcoin long position is currently making a profit of $1.31 million. They took a long position on BTC with an average price of $112,992.84, and their total position size currently amounts to 1930.979 BTC, with a collateral of approximately $43.9 million.

item.title: Source: InsiderInsider: JD, Ant Group May Have Difficulty Appearing on Initial Hong Kong Stablecoin License List
item.description: On August 3rd, as reported by Caixin, a source close to the applicant for the Hong Kong stablecoin license disclosed that with the finalization of regulatory rules, the Hong Kong stablecoin craze will wane. Especially since the main application scenario is for non-financial institutions engaged in cross-border payments, some applicants may proactively withdraw from early participation due to the difficulty of meeting the regulatory requirement of "verifying the identity of each holder." This also implies that previously popular internet platforms like JD.com and Ant Group may face challenges in appearing on the first batch of license lists.Furthermore, CITIC Group, through its Hong Kong subsidiary CITIC International, has joined forces with some institutions to apply for the first batch of stablecoin licenses. Some industry insiders have indicated that Bank of China Hong Kong, as one of Hong Kong's three note-issuing banks, would have a natural advantage if it were to issue a stablec
